item.description:
Hi Bicycling Friends,

I would love to bike the Minuteman Bikeway this Saturday, August 18th. Meet at the Alewife Station at 9 AM to ride the path out to Bedford. The path is 11 miles from Alewife to Bedford.

Bring water to drink and snacks. Restrooms are available at Depot Park in Bedford (seasonal outhouses), Lexington Visitor?s Center, Alewife Station, and nearby business districts along the bikeway, and I am sure we can find some ice cream along the way.

Rain or T-storms will cancel.

Please let me know if you are interested.

Link to Official Minuteman Website

The website has a map that you can download.
item.name: MinuteMan Bikeway
